tool_description: Crawl any publicly available content like blog posts or news articles by providing a URL to a specific article.
name: Content Crawler
title: Content Crawler

api_list.name: Content Scrapper
api_list.description:
Crawl endpoint accepts two arguments.

- url - is required parameter to scrape content from the URL
- type - Type of the content that will be returned: html, markdown or plain text. If not specified by default returns data as HTML
